resources.string:
This Quiz contains total 5 questions with four options to choose from. 

Each question has only one right option. Choose the right option and click on Submit button to go to next question. 

At the end of quiz total number of correct and wrong answers and total score will be shown. 

Each right answer gives 2 points and wrong answer gives -1. 

Note: Each question should be answered within 10 seconds. 

All the best.
